output:
The horizon has just gone while the sea gathers its energies
And the waves keep on grow while I keep on staring
And I will leave it at all
And I will pray for them all
To find their way to the shore and right in line
And I will leave it at all
The sand wore my skin while the whistle of the wind blows my hair
And the sun wraps my soul while the day turns to dusk
And I will leave it at all
And I will pray for them all
To find their way to the shore and right in line
And I will leave it at all
